attributes.mlflow.spanInputs: {"prompt": "Generate Cisco IOS XR 7.0.1 telemetry configuration for multicast (PIM/IGMP) operational monitoring (neighbors, groups, interfaces). Use gRPC with no TLS. Server 192.0.2.116 port 57500. Choose relevant sensor-paths."}
attributes.mlflow.spanOutputs:
"telemetry model-driven
 sensor-group MULTICAST-OP
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-igmp-oper:igmp/active/default-context/neighbor-details/neighbor-detail
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-igmp-oper:igmp/active/default-context/group-details/group-detail
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-ipv4-igmp-oper:igmp/active/default-context/interface-details/interface-detail
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-pim-oper:pim/active/default-context/neighbor-details/neighbor-detail
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-pim-oper:pim/active/default-context/interface-details/interface-detail
 !
 destination-group DG-GRPC
  address-family ipv4
   destination 192.0.2.116
    port 57500
    encoding self-describing-gpb
    protocol grpc no-tls
 !
 subscription SUB-MULTICAST-OP
  sensor-group-id MULTICAST-OP sample-interval 30000
  destination-group-id DG-GRPC
 !"
